1.7.name: wordpress/the-holy-scripturizer
1.7.description:
Automaticallly hyperlink Bible references. No special tags or extra coding are needed. Simply type a Bible reference, like John 3:16, and it is converted automatically to John 3:16.

Scripturizer uses PHP-based filtering to automatically convert Bible references in your posts, pages, and comments into hyperlinks which point to major online Bible websites, such as the Bible Gateway, NET Bible, the ESV Bible, and others.

Features:

  • New Display verse when mousing over reference.
  • Updated Simplified admin interface.
  • Easy to install
  • Easy to administer via the admin panel under the Options/Settings tab (Options/Settings --> Scripturizer
